llm_res.rule: The function `symbol` should return the symbol of the token. E.g., 'HIX'.
The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism.

The function `approve` should allow `_spender` to withdraw from your account multiple times, up to the `_value` amount. If this function is called again it overwrites the current allowance with `_value`.
